message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a great fit for you. Given its value and features, I'm offering it at $20,000.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your reply. I understand your budget constraints, but $20,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you consider meeting me halfway at $16,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I'm still unable to meet the $16,000 price point. I would like to stick to my budget of $12,000 if possible.
